eternalcombat.status.description: Users with this permission will be able to see theirs and others combat status.

eternalcombat.tag.description: Users with this permission will be able to tag players into a fight.

eternalcombat.untag.description: Users with this permission will be able to untag players from a fight.

eternalcombat.reload.description: Users with this permission will be able to reload the plugin.

eternalcombat.receiveupdates.description: Allows receiving notifications about new versions of the plugin.
